short_description_localized.en: Measuring 51 square metres/549 square feet, with a king-size bed, The Michelangelo Hotel’s Junior Suites combine comfort and elegance with perfection.
short_description_localized.fr: Measuring 51 square metres/549 square feet, with a king-size bed, The Michelangelo Hotel’s Junior Suites combine comfort and elegance with perfection.
short_description_localized.it: Measuring 51 square metres/549 square feet, with a king-size bed, The Michelangelo Hotel’s Junior Suites combine comfort and elegance with perfection.

description_localized.en: Measuring 51 square metres/549 square feet, The Michelangelo Hotel’s Junior Suites combine comfort and elegance with perfection. They are tastefully decorated, with ornate fabrics, luxurious king-size beds, marble bathrooms and large living areas. Max 2 guests.
description_localized.fr: Measuring 51 square metres/549 square feet, The Michelangelo Hotel’s Junior Suites combine comfort and elegance with perfection. They are tastefully decorated, with ornate fabrics, luxurious king-size beds, marble bathrooms and large living areas. Max 2 guests.
description_localized.it: Measuring 51 square metres/549 square feet, The Michelangelo Hotel’s Junior Suites combine comfort and elegance with perfection. They are tastefully decorated, with ornate fabrics, luxurious king-size beds, marble bathrooms and large living areas. Max 2 guests.
